title: Access Assistant Community Edition
creator: Level Access
description: Test web pages for accessibility instantaneously, directly within the browser. Most accessibility testing tools will test only the static code. With Access Assistant you can test all iterations of the code, including web components. Elements with violations are highlighted on the page.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
